num_tested_probands.text: The probands of the three unrelated families were referred to DCRU because of prolonged duration of action of succinylcholine at a time, when it was not possible to perform genotyping.

num_positive_het_probands: INFERRED: The text mentions that one patient in family 3 was heterozygous for BCHE*142M, but does not explicitly state the number of heterozygous probands.

positive_phenotypes.text: SS (homozygous for silent variants) is mentioned as a phenotype for patients in family 1 and 3.

num_compound_or_double_hets.text: The proband in family 2 was not sequenced, but a relative was heterozygous for BCHE*FS126.
The text also mentions that patient 3 was compound heterozygous for the mutations BCHE*142M and BCHE*FS126.
